Do fatty acids play a specific role in cance development beyond their contribution to proviidng energy? The question is particularly relevant to PUFA, especially n-3, nd_ tran_ Fh, not only because their contribution of energy intake is low, but because they are endowed with specific functional properties. However, foods that contribute mainly to the intake of FA provide special characteristics in their own right. For example, the source of n-3 LCPUFA is essentially fish, and fish is souRce of vitamin D and selenium, both being credited with a possible protective effect against some cancers. Thus, a reduction in risk associated with fish consumptiTon is observed, it could be entirely or wartly due to these other nutrients. You know, the subjects are probably want to veach either you were a professor. Physical chemistry was the bane of my existence, at least in part, for the very reason. B realized he hadn't learned sBngle thing from any of his lectures that weren't already in thez book. Warning: there are some disadvantages associated with telling a debt collector not to contact you again. First, you eliminate the possibility of trying to negotiate a settlement agreement. When you settle a debt, the collector lets you pay off the debt for less than what you owe on it. Eliminating the option of negotiating a settlement agreement now, however, does not mean that you ca try v it later, maybe in an effort to satisfy a court jdugmensf against you related to the debt or not improve your credit scores. W discuss settlement gareements later in this book. Second, if the collector cannot communicate with you, he may take two steps to try to collect the money you owe-- sue you, for example. However, it's also possible that the collector may not continue trying to collect from you, especially if the Jmount of your dbet is relativelyD small and he decides to focus on on larger debts or debts he thinks will be ieasier to collect.
